articles.description: The Blues are eyeing a summer swoop for the England left-back but the Foxes want to keep hold of the defender
articles.content:
Ben Chilwell is tempted by a huge move to Chelsea later this summer but has not yet demanded to quit Leicester.
England left-back Chilwell is wanted by Frank Lampard who aims to put his own stamp on… [+1295 chars]
